data.comment: The match is underway. Volgograd have kicked-off.
Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
CSKA Moscow are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 7, Volgograd are whistled for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Volgograd.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Volgograd at Zenit Stadium.
Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 16, Pavel Kukuyan awards the away team a throw-in.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Volgograd's half.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
In the minute 18, CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
In the minute 21, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Andres Ponce (Volgograd) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Arnor Sigurdsson (CSKA Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
In the minute 23, CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a throw-in for CSKA Moscow, close to Volgograd's area.
Zurab Davitashvili for Volgograd gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 24, Pavel Kukuyan awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 27, CSKA Moscow's Arnor Sigurdsson breaks free at Zenit Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
Pavel Kukuyan awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 29, Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Zenit Stadium.
CSKA Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 32, Arnor Sigurdsson is booked for the away team.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
In the minute 36, CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
CSKA Moscow's Nikola Vlasic misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 38, Pavel Kukuyan awards Volgograd a goal kick.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at Zenit Stadium.
Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 40, CSKA Moscow drive upfield and Igor Diveev gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Volgograd defender.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Goal! Alan Dzagoev gives CSKA Moscow a 0-1 lead in Volgograd.
In the minute 41, Arnor Sigurdsson with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Flamarion (Volgograd) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, Volgograd needs to be cautious. CSKA Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
At Zenit Stadium the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in Volgograd.
In the minute 45, In Volgograd a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The first-half is over.
The second half is underway in Volgograd - CSKA Moscow with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Volgograd in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Nikola Vlasic for CSKA Moscow drives towards goal at Zenit Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
CSKA Moscow advance rapidly upfield but Pavel Kukuyan blows for offside.
In the minute 49, Pavel Kukuyan signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Volgograd's half.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Volgograd's half?
In the minute 54, CSKA Moscow's Fedor Chalov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Zenit Stadium.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Free kick Volgograd.
CSKA Moscow drives forward and Arnor Sigurdsson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 62, CSKA Moscow make their first substitution with Ivan Oblyakov replacing Alan Dzagoev.
Viktor Goncharenko (CSKA Moscow) is making a second substitution, with Chidera Ejuke replacing Fedor Chalov.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 64, Beka Mikeltadze is replacing Kamil Mullin for the home team.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 67, CSKA Moscow pushes forward through Chidera Ejuke, whose finish on goal is saved.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
In the minute 68, Ball safe as Volgograd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Oleg Aleynik is on a sub for Evgeniy Pesegov for Volgograd.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nayair Tiknizyan is replacing Konstantin Kuchaev for CSKA Moscow at Zenit Stadium.
The away team have replaced Arnor Sigurdsson with Adolfo Gaich. This is the fourth substitution made today by Viktor Goncharenko.
In the minute 71, Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
CSKA Moscow are coming forward and Baktiyor Zaynutdinov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 73, Volgograd have a goal kick.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Volgograd.
In the minute 76, CSKA Moscow drive upfield and Chidera Ejuke gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Volgograd defender.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Throw-in Volgograd.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 81, Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Andres Ponce (Volgograd) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
In the minute 83, Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Volgograd.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Zenit Stadium.
In the minute 87, CSKA Moscow drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
The away team replace Nikola Vlasic with Kristijan Bistrovic.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Pavel Kukuyan will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Nayair Tiknizyan (CSKA Moscow) gets a yellow card.
